avdta.network.link

Class LinkRecord

  • java.lang.Object
    • avdta.network.link.LinkRecord

  • public class LinkRecord
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents and manipulates the data used to construct Links

    • Constructor Summary

    • Constructor Detail

      • LinkRecord

        public LinkRecord(int id,
                  int type,
                  int source,
                  int dest,
                  double length,
                  double ffspd,
                  double wavespd,
                  double capacity,
                  int numLanes)
        Constructs this LinkRecord with the given parameters
        Parameters:
        id - the id of the Link
        type - the type code
        source - the id of the upstream Node
        dest - the id of the downstream Node
        length - the length (mi)
        ffspd - the free flow speed (mi/hr)
        wavespd - the congested wave speed (mi/hr)
        capacity - the capacity (veh/hr)
        numLanes - the number of lanes
